snippet: To encourage reporting, prosecution decisions should be outside the chain of command.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Sen Carl Levin for introducing amendment that would strike bipartisan proposal to give independent military prosecutors power to decide which sexual assault crimes to try, fixing basic structural flaw in military justice system; notes proposal was most promising corrective to problem of sexual assaults in the military.
lead_paragraph: To encourage reporting, prosecution decisions should be outside the chain of command.

headline.main: A Failure on Military Sexual Assaults
headline.print_headline: A Failure on Military Sexual Assaults

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
